name: Bill.com Holdings, Inc.
description: Bill.com Holdings, Inc. is a leading provider of cloud-based software that simplifies and automates financial operations for small and midsize businesses (SMBs). Founded in 2006 and headquartered in Palo Alto, California, Bill.com aims to transform the way businesses manage their financial processes, including accounts payable, accounts receivable, and cash flow management. The platform integrates seamlessly with popular accounting software, allowing users to streamline their workflows and reduce manual tasks. By leveraging advanced technology, including artificial intelligence and machine learning, Bill.com enhances financial visibility and control, enabling businesses to operate more efficiently. The company has gained significant traction, serving hundreds of thousands of customers and processing billions of dollars in transactions annually. Bill.com is committed to empowering SMBs by providing them with the tools needed to manage their finances effectively, thus allowing them to focus on growth and innovation. With its user-friendly interface and robust features, Bill.com continues to lead the market in financial automation and digital payments.

seo.meta_title: Bill.com Holdings, Inc. | Financial Automation Software for SMBs
seo.meta_description: Explore Bill.com Holdings, Inc., a leader in cloud-based financial automation software. Simplify your accounts payable, accounts receivable, and cash flow management with Bill.com.

faq.question: What does Bill.com do?
faq.answer: Bill.com provides cloud-based software that automates financial operations for small and midsize businesses.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Bill.com?
faq.answer: Rene Lacerte is the CEO of Bill.com Holdings, Inc.

faq.question: Where is Bill.com headquartered?
faq.answer: Bill.com is headquartered in Palo Alto, California, USA.

faq.question: What are the main products offered by Bill.com?
faq.answer: Bill.com's main products include accounts payable, accounts receivable, and cash flow management solutions.
